css: .adv-countdown-banner { margin: 10px 15px 2px 15px; background: var(--bg-card); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); border-top: 3px solid var(--text-main); border-radius: 14px; padding: 18px 10px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; text-align: center; gap: 10px; box-shadow: var(--shadow-md); font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif; position: relative; animation: slideDownFade 0.6s ease-out; } .countdown-timer { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 6px; flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; } .timer-segment { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; min-width: 48px; } .countdown-digit { font-size: 26px; font-weight: 800; color: var(--text-main); background: var(--bg-body); padding: 6px 4px; border-radius: 10px; width: 100%; border: 1px solid var(--border-color); } .countdown-label { font-size: 8px; text-transform: uppercase; color: var(--text-sub); margin-top: 6px; font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 1px; } .countdown-separator { font-size: 22px; font-weight: 300; color: var(--border-color); margin-top: -18px; } .countdown-header { color: var(--text-main); font-weight: 800; font-size: 14px; text-transform: uppercase; } .countdown-message { color: var(--text-sub); font-size: 11px; } .countdown-action-btn { margin-top: 5px; background: var(--success); color: #fff; border: none; padding: 8px 20px; border-radius: 25px; font-weight: 700; font-size: 13px; cursor: pointer; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3); transition: transform 0.2s; text-decoration: none; display: inline-block; } .countdown-action-btn:hover { transform: scale(1.05); } @keyframes slideDownFade { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-15px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

name: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Alert
html: {{TITLE}} {{MESSAGE}}
css: .adv-alert-banner { margin: 10px 15px 0px 15px; background: var(--bg-card); border-left: 4px solid #ef4444; border-radius: 12px; padding: 12px; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); animation: slideIn 0.4s ease; border: 1px solid var(--border-color); border-left-width: 4px; } .alert-icon-box { color: #ef4444; height: 24px; width: 24px; flex-shrink: 0; } .alert-content { display: flex; flex-direction: column; flex: 1; } .alert-title { font-weight: 700; font-size: 14px; color: var(--text-main); } .alert-msg { font-size: 12px; color: var(--text-sub); } @keyframes slideIn { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-10px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

css: .adv-glass-review { margin: 12px 15px; background: var(--bg-card); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); border-radius: 20px; padding: 20px; box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.2); backdrop-filter: blur(10px); font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif; animation: revFadeUp 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1); } .rev-header { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 8px; } .rev-title-group { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; } .rev-main-title { color: var(--text-main); font-weight: 800; font-size: 16px; } .rev-close-btn { background: none; border: none; color: var(--text-sec); font-size: 18px; cursor: pointer; } .rev-subtitle { color: var(--text-sec); font-size: 13px; margin: 0 0 18px 0; } .rev-star-bar { display: flex; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 20px; justify-content: center; padding: 5px; border-radius: 10px; transition: 0.3s; } .rev-star-bar.error-shake { background: rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.1); animation: shake 0.4s; } .rev-star { font-size: 32px; color: var(--border-color); cursor: pointer; transition: 0.3s; } .rev-star.active { color: #FFD700; transform: scale(1.2); } .input-container { width: 100%; display: flex; justify-content: center; } .rev-input { width: 100%; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.2); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); border-radius: 12px; padding: 12px; color: var(--text-main); font-size: 14px; resize: none; height: 100px; margin-bottom: 15px; outline: none; } .rev-submit-primary { width: 100%; background: var(--text-main); color: var(--bg-body); border: none; padding: 14px; border-radius: 12px; font-weight: 800; cursor: pointer; } @keyframes shake { 0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); } 25% { transform: translateX(-5px); } 75% { transform: translateX(5px); } } @keyframes revFadeUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

name: ‚ú® New Feature Promo
css: .adv-promo-simple { margin: 10px 15px 0 15px; background: var(--bg-card); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); border-radius: 50px; padding: 6px 12px 6px 6px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); animation: popIn 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.175, 0.885, 0.32, 1.275); } .promo-left { display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 10px; } .promo-badge { background: var(--text-main); color: var(--bg-body); font-size: 10px; font-weight: 800; padding: 4px 8px; border-radius: 20px; } .promo-text { font-size: 13px; font-weight: 600; color: var(--text-main); } .promo-action { background: transparent; border: none; color: #3b82f6; font-weight: 700; font-size: 13px; cursor: pointer; margin-right: 5px; } @keyframes popIn { from { transform: scale(0.9); opacity: 0; } to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

name: üñºÔ∏è Simple Image Banner
css: .adv-img-banner { margin: 10px 15px 0 15px; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); animation: slideIn 0.4s ease; border: 1px solid var(--border-color); } .adv-img-banner img { width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; object-fit: cover; }

name: üîó Clickable Image Ad
css: .adv-img-click-banner { margin: 10px 15px 0 15px; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); animation: slideIn 0.4s ease; border: 1px solid var(--border-color); cursor: pointer; transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease; } .adv-img-click-banner:hover { transform: scale(1.01); box-shadow: var(--shadow-md); } .adv-img-click-banner:active { transform: scale(0.98); opacity: 0.9; } .adv-img-click-banner img { width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; object-fit: cover; }

name: ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Auto-Play Video Ad
css: .adv-video-banner { margin: 10px 15px 0 15px; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); cursor: pointer; } .adv-video-banner video { width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; object-fit: cover; }

name: ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Simple Video (No Click)
css: .adv-video-banner { margin: 10px 15px 0 15px; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); } .adv-video-banner video { width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; object-fit: cover; }

name: üîá/üîä Video with Mute Toggle
css: .adv-video-container { position: relative; margin: 10px 15px 0 15px; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); background: #000; } video { width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; } .mute-btn { position: absolute; bottom: 10px; right: 10px; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); color: white; border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.3); border-radius: 50%; width: 35px; height: 35px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; backdrop-filter: blur(4px); transition: all 0.2s; } .mute-btn:active { transform: scale(0.9); background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); }

name: üé¨ Smart-Fit Video (Fixed Height)
css: .adv-smart-video { position: relative; margin: 10px 15px 0 15px; height: 200px; /* FIXED HEIGHT */ background: #000; border-radius: 12px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm); border: 1px solid var(--border-color); } video { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; /* ESSENTIAL: Fills box, crops excess */ object-position: center; display: block; } .video-overlay { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; pointer-events: none; /* Allows clicking through overlay if needed */ } .mute-btn-smart { position: absolute; bottom: 12px; right: 12px; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); color: white; border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.2); border-radius: 50%; width: 32px; height: 32px; cursor: pointer; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; backdrop-filter: blur(4px); pointer-events: auto; transition: transform 0.2s; } .mute-btn-smart:active { transform: scale(0.9); }

css: .adv-maint-banner { margin: 10px 15px; overflow: hidden; background: var(--bg-card); border-radius: 12px; border: 1px solid var(--border-color); box-shadow: var(--shadow-md); display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .maint-strip { height: 4px; width: 100%; background: repeating-linear-gradient( 45deg, #f59e0b, #f59e0b 10px, #fbbf24 10px, #fbbf24 20px ); } .maint-body { padding: 15px; text-align: center; } .maint-body b { color: var(--text-main); font-size: 14px; display: block; margin-bottom: 4px; } .maint-body p { color: var(--text-sub); font-size: 12px; margin: 0; }
